text: Anne Bright Holton (born February 1, 1958) is an American politician and educator. She served as the Virginia Secretary of Education from 2014-2016.Moriah Balingit, "Anne Holton, wife of Clinton's running mate, resigns as Va.'s education secretary", Washington Post (July 26, 2016). She is also the wife of United States Senator and former Governor Tim Kaine. She served as First Lady of Virginia from 2006 to 2010. Her father is former Virginia Governor Linwood Holton. ==Other websites== * * National Governors Association Biography * KidsCommonwealth Biography ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Virginia Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from Virginia
title: Anne Holton
